Container.Name: kutt
Container.Overview: Kutt is a modern URL shortener with support for custom domains. Shorten URLs, manage your links and view the click rate statistics. [b]This container requires Redis a Postgres database and a functioning FQDN![b] Setup: 1. Install the Postgres container from your Apps tab. 2. Create a database an user. 3. Give the user permissions on the created database. 4. Install the Redis container from your Apps tab. 5. Setup an email account which Kutt can use. (technically optional but highly recommended!) 6. Setup an your preferred method of exposing Kutt to the outside world. 7. Fill out this template. Optional: 1. Setup Google Safe Browsing 2. Setup Google Analytics

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 3000

Config.Name: Database host
Config.Description: IP of your Postgres instance

Config.Name: Database port
Config.Description: Port of your postgres instance

Config.Name: Database name
Config.Description: Name of your database. Make sure the database is already created and your user has the needed permissions!

Config.Name: Database user
Config.Description: Name of your database user

Config.Name: Database password
Config.Description: Password of your database user

Config.Name: Database SSL
Config.Description: Use SSL for database connection

Config.Name: Redis host
Config.Description: IP of your Redis instance

Config.Name: Redis
Config.Description: Port of your Redis instance

Config.Name: Redis password
Config.Description: Password for your Redis instance. Leave blank if you didn't set one!

Config.Name: Mail host
Config.Description: Hostname (FQDN or IP) of your mail provider. Used to send verification emails

Config.Name: Mail port
Config.Description: Port of your mail provider. 25 (unencrypted), 587 (TLS), 465 (SMTPS)

Config.Name: Mail secure
Config.Description: Set to true if using port 465

Config.Name: Mail user
Config.Description: Your email username. Most likely your email address

Config.Name: Mail password
Config.Description: Password of your email user

Config.Name: Mail from
Config.Description: Sender address

Config.Name: Admin emails
Config.Description: Comma seperated list of admin email adresses

Config.Name: Report email
Config.Description: The email address that will receive submitted reports

Config.Name: Contact email
Config.Description: Support email to show on the app

Config.Name: Domain
Config.Description: The domain that this website is on

Config.Name: Site name
Config.Description: The name of the site where Kutt is hosted

Config.Name: Link length
Config.Description: Generated link length

Config.Name: Disable registration
Config.Description: Disable registration

Config.Name: Disable anonymous link creation
Config.Description: Disable anonymous link creation

Config.Name: Daily link limit
Config.Description: Default limit for how many links a user can create per day

Config.Name: Anonymous links cooldown
Config.Description: Number of links anonymous users can create per minute. Ignored if anonymous link creation is disabled

Config.Name: Max number of stats per link
Config.Description: Max number of visits for each link to have detailed stats

Config.Name: JSON Web Token key
Config.Description: A passphrase to encrypt JWT. Use a long and secure key.

Config.Name: reCaptcha site key
Config.Description: Invisible reCaptcha key. Create one here https://www.google.com/recaptcha/intro/

Config.Name: reCaptcha secret key
Config.Description: Container Variable: RECAPTCHA_SECRET_KEY

Config.Name: Google safe browsing key
Config.Description: Google Cloud API to prevent from users from submitting malware URLs. Get one from https://developers.google.com/safe-browsing/v4/get-started

Config.Name: Google Analytics key
Config.Description: your GA key

Config.Name: Google Analytics universal key
Config.Description: Your universal GA key

Config.Name: Internal port
Config.Description: Internal application port. Do not change this!
